Interested investors should prepare **USDC on Arbitrum**. ‚úâÔ∏è **[Sign up to get notified when sales goes live](https://www.longboat.fi/)** üëâ **[Follow LongBoat on X](https://x.com/longboat_fi)** to catch the next sale **Visit longboat.io to learn more** (https://longboat.io) View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/d23ac542-c5a8-4ab3-adfb-d5523a23daa6/image.png) Caption: **WHAT MATTERS** ## **Galaxy Sells $9B in Satoshi-Era BTC** View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/09866b46-f17a-4850-ac96-af4dd60d5e1f/image.png?t=1753672866) Caption: Source: Lookonchain **State of play:** Galaxy Digital has confirmed executing one of the largest bitcoin transactions ever recorded, [selling over 80,000 BTC valued at more than $9B](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/galaxy-executes-one-of-the-largest-notional-bitcoin-transactions-ever-302514123.html) on behalf of a Satoshi-era investor. * According to the firm, this was part of the client's estate planning strategy. * The transaction, which involved deposits to multiple exchanges including Binance and OKX, caused Bitcoin to dip below $115,000 amid increased market volatility. * CEO Mike Novogratz remains optimistic, predicting Bitcoin could hit $150,000 this year while expecting Ethereum to outperform in the short term due to rising institutional interest. **Why it matters**: Massive BTC sales from old whale funds can shake market confidence and drive price volatility. **Our take:** Galaxy‚Äôs offload shows strategic profit-taking near all-time highs, but remaining holdings suggest they‚Äôre not done with Bitcoin yet. **For builders and investors:** Watch for renewed volatility and consider ETH exposure, as institutional interest appears to be rotating into Ethereum. View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/ee9530b4-5ac4-4ca0-88e3-1bd3b03292ad/image.png) Caption: **PRODUCT OF THE WEEK** ## **Grok X Kalshi ** Tweet: (https://twitter.com/xai/status/1948424094883471702) Elon Musk‚Äôs xAI has [integrated](https://www.theblock.co/post/364217/elon-musk-grok-kalshi) its Grok conversational AI into Kalshi, the only CFTC-regulated event contract exchange. * This integration allows Kalshi users to access real-time AI-powered insights, including on-chain data, historical odds, and news. * The move gives Grok a live testing ground while enhancing Kalshi‚Äôs product with intelligent forecasting tools. * Kalshi, which **raised $185M at a $2B valuation** in June 2025 led by Paradigm, supports crypto deposits (BTC, SOL, USDC, WLD) but settles all trades in USD. **Other cool products: ** * [Boredtopia](https://fff.boredtopia.app/), a Web3 gaming platform. * [Celuvplay](https://game.astian.io/), a Web3 entertainment ecosystem. * [Miracle Play](https://www.miracleplay.gg/), a blockchain-based esports tournament platform. * [MEET48](https://www.meet48.com/), a Web3.0 social metaverse platform focused on idol entertainment. * [Teahouse Finance](https://vault.teahouse.finance/), a DeFi asset management protocol and liquidity manager. ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî _Take a peek at our referral reward at the bottom of this issue. Share this newsletter and receive our list of 500 crypto VC individuals üëá_ View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/7ff06237-5586-4311-a42e-6dfcbc96db8c/image.png) Caption: **CHARTS OF THE WEEK** ## **Windtree Targets $720M BNB Treasury** View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/b98bc0b9-9a8a-4d42-a6ef-f67632ee5445/Screen_Shot_2025-07-28_at_10.40.53.png?t=1753674101) Caption: **State of play**: Windtree [secured $520M in equity financing,](https://www.theblock.co/post/364279/windtree-secures-over-500m-equity-line-of-credit-to-build-bnb-treasury-taps-kraken-for-custody) including a $500M credit line and $20M from Build and Build Corp, with **90%** allocated to BNB purchases to build one of the largest public crypto treasuries. * This follows a prior **$60M** commitment, bringing its total potential BNB buying power to **$720M**. * Kraken will provide custody, OTC, and trading services once shareholders approve the plan. * Windtree‚Äôs aggressive entry comes as more public companies boost their crypto holdings. According to data from The Block, the total stacked market cap of crypto-holding public firms has surged past** $180B** as of July 2025, led by giants like MicroStrategy, Riot Platforms, and MARA Holdings. * GameStop, Metaplanet, and 21 other firms are also contributing to this growth, with significant new positions in BTC, ETH, SOL, and now BNB. **Our take: **As more public firms diversify into crypto, expect treasuries to become key battlegrounds for on-chain influence and market perception. View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/368537c9-5c99-490d-af07-8bd1f4ee7b41/image.png) Caption: ## **Christie‚Äôs Offers $1B in Homes for Crypto** View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/dc11af87-d707-4930-a8a9-3d9f42394b0f/image.png?t=1753675261) Caption: Source: eMarketer **State of play**: Christie‚Äôs International Real Estate has launched a new division focused on facilitating [luxury property sales using cryptocurrency](https://www.theblock.co/post/364227/christies-offers-1-billion-in-luxury-real-estate-to-buyers-paying-with-crypto-nyt). * According to the New York Times, over **$1B** worth of real estate listings are now open to crypto-only offers. * The move comes after several high-value deals, including a **$65M** Beverly Hills sale completed entirely in crypto. * Led by Southern California CEO Aaron Kirman, the division employs a team of lawyers and crypto experts to ensure secure, bank-free transactions. * Some deals even allow anonymous buyers, provided the source of funds is verified. Featured properties include the iconic Invisible House in Joshua Tree. * Kirman believes crypto could account for over one-third of US home sales within five years. **Our take: **Christie‚Äôs move reflects growing confidence in crypto as a medium for high-value transactions, though the market‚Äôs reliance on legal vetting and niche buyers suggests mainstream adoption is still unfolding.
